msbt.message: Hey, what're you starin' at? I know I ain't the best housekeeper, butEh, whatever. Just try an' make yourself at home, best you can.

I refuse to compromise on sleepin' comfort. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You can probably tell that from my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Before this one, I used to toss and turn half the night. You gotta make sure an' choose your bed carefully.
My television's kinda my roommate.Best kind of roommate too One that'll never talk back!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Music just plain sounds better on my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Makes me sound like some kinda audio snob, but really I don't know anythin' about that stuff. Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I see you admirin' my stylish .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, it's more'n just a timepiece I got it as a conversation piece.
They say your plants'll thrive if you talk to 'em a whole bunchTo see if it's true, I've been talkin' to my .Now that I said that out loud, it sounds kinda sad, .
I like to soak my achin' bones in my .Most days it really helps. And after a warm bath, chugging down a nice is just the best!
<20_2 arg="10" />My <20_2 arg="9" /> may not look like much, but it's really comfy. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You shouldn't judge by looks alone.
You know, chairs ain't just for sittin'.You can put things on 'em, or you can use 'em to reach high places. So they're both tool and furniture!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't actually know how to play my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />An old friend gave it to me and I don't want to toss it, so there it sits. Least it looks cool, right?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm not really even sure why I have my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm not much of a chef, to be honest. I either burn or boil everythin' I eat.

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Uh, you weren't meant to see that I've been meanin' to get rid of it.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I picked it up because I was plannin' to get fit, but never found the time.
I like bein' outdoors where I can gaze up at the sky and think.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Guess that's why I picked up my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Haven't actually used it yet, though.
